course_title: Pastoral Care in Congregation and Community
class_notes: (not open to students who have taken or will take PC 501CE because this is a noncontextualized version of the same course) (ONLINE: live synchronous sessions Tuesdays 2:30-4:30 pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via online asynchronous engagement)
course_description: This course approaches pastoral care as an ecclesial practice. The specific context of care is the congregation. Students will be introduced to the literature, theory and practices of pastoral care as a part of the church's redemptive ministry, as well as basic practices of pastoral care as dimensions of congregational ministry.
